item.description:
Hi Meetup Members

There've been a big and famous festival "Halloween(Salem)" in this month. So, we organize a “Halloween Meetup” in Salem!!

That event consist of Visiting, Free time(Shopping)...
These item is good for you to learn the Salem histories and to enjoy with another person.
So, would you like to enjoy the time with us to make a good memories?

Where North Station
(I’ll update the information in detail to gather and wait)

How Use subway
Take orange line or green line and get off at North Station.
Secondly, come to the waiting place of platform on Commuter Rail.

Cost Transfer Fee/Lunch & Dinner Fee/Costume Fee (Option)

What & Schedule
10:00～10:15 Gathering
10:15～10:45 Moving from North Station to Salem Station by train

11:00～ Halloween tour start
(Visiting) Witch house
(Free & Rest time) Pedestrian Mall & Museum Place Mall
(Free & Rest time) National Park Service Visitor Center
12:00～13:00 Lunch

13:00～ Start tour again
(Playing) the costume - Option
(Visiting) Salem Witch Museum
(Visiting) Custom House
(Visiting) Salem Maritime National Historic Site
(Visiting) Burying Point Cemetery
(Free & Rest time) Pedestrian Mall & Museum Place Mall
(Free & Rest time) National Park Service Visitor Center

18:00 End of Halloween tour
18:15～ Dinner - Free talking like Prudential Meetup
20:00～ Bar - Free drinking like Prudential Meetup
21:30～22:00 Moving from Salem Station to North Station by train
22:15 Break up

Advanced information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Wear comfortable shoes!!
Salem is an old city,
and a lot of the walking areas are cobblestones which can be uneven.
Definitely no high heels for you ladies (or men for that matter).

> Dress in layers.
Weather forcasts for Sunday suggest wind,
temperatures in the low 60s F, and possibly morning rain,
so dress warm and bring an umbrella or hood.

> Make sure you bring some cash.
Not all the little shops in Salem accept debit/credit cards,
though the restaurants we will eat at do.
There are several ATMs around, including a Bank of America.

> Bring a camera!
There are a lot of fun,
unique, and strange things in Salem that you won't want to miss!

> Some more no-brainers
Make sure you bring a charged cell phone in case you need to call us or home,and vice versa; also bring your ID if you plan on using a debit/credit card, or you wanna drink.

> Everyone will be given a card of emergency numbers (our cell phone, Salem police, etc) just in case!! You will also get a map of the area and a magazine of events if you're interested.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I’m looking forward to enjoying with Meetup members!!
Sincerely to you.
item.name: Halloween Meetup
